WorkItem.Description:
Hi , i want to apply border to pdf report. But if i applied border with like

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('A8:B8')->getBorders()->getAllBorders()->setColor(new \PHPExcel_Style_Color(\PHPExcel_Style_Color::COLOR_BLACK));

along with this another cell also displayed with borders.
Please tell me solution over this.
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: How to apply border to a pdf report
